title: Understanding Data Tables
text: A data table is a tool used in spreadsheets to analyze how changes in one or more variables affect the results of formulas.

title: Components of a Data Table
text: Data tables typically consist of a range of cells that include input values, formulas, and the resulting output values.

hintAnswer: a range of cells that shows answers generated by formulas in which different values have been substituted
title: Identifying the Correct Definition
text: Which of the following best describes a data table?
choices: a range of cells that shows answers generated by formulas in which different values have been substituted
a list of elements generated by formulas
